# gitea_branch_protection (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about branch protection rules for a Gitea repository.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name or pattern of the protected branch rule to look up.
- `owner` (String) The owner of the repository (username or organization name).
- `repo` (String) The name of the repository.

### Read-Only

- `approvals_whitelist_teams` (List of String) List of team names whose members' approvals count toward the required approval count.
- `approvals_whitelist_username` (List of String) List of usernames whose approvals count toward the required approval count.
- `block_admin_merge_override` (Boolean) Whether to prevent administrators from bypassing branch protection.
- `block_on_official_review_requests` (Boolean) Whether to block merging if there are pending official review requests.
- `block_on_outdated_branch` (Boolean) Whether to block merging if the branch is not up to date with the base branch.
- `block_on_rejected_reviews` (Boolean) Whether to block merging if there are rejected reviews.
- `branch_name` (String, Deprecated) **Deprecated:** Use `name` instead. The branch name pattern for this protection rule.
- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the branch protection rule was created.
- `dismiss_stale_approvals` (Boolean) Whether to dismiss existing approvals when new commits are pushed.
- `enable_approvals_whitelist` (Boolean) Whether only whitelisted users/teams count toward required approvals.
- `enable_force_push` (Boolean) Whether force pushing is allowed.
- `enable_force_push_allowlist` (Boolean) Whether force push access is restricted to a whitelist.
- `enable_merge_whitelist` (Boolean) Whether merge access is restricted to a whitelist of users and teams.
- `enable_push` (Boolean) Whether pushing to the branch is enabled.
- `enable_push_whitelist` (Boolean) Whether push access is restricted to a whitelist of users and teams.
- `enable_status_check` (Boolean) Whether status checks must pass before merging.
- `force_push_allowlist_deploy_keys` (Boolean) Whether deploy keys can force push to the protected branch.
- `force_push_allowlist_teams` (List of String) List of team names allowed to force push to the protected branch.
- `force_push_allowlist_usernames` (List of String) List of usernames allowed to force push to the protected branch.
- `ignore_stale_approvals` (Boolean) Whether to ignore stale approvals instead of dismissing them.
- `merge_whitelist_teams` (List of String) List of team names allowed to merge pull requests.
- `merge_whitelist_usernames` (List of String) List of usernames allowed to merge pull requests.
- `priority` (Number) The priority of this branch protection rule (higher values take precedence).
- `protected_file_patterns` (String) Glob patterns of files that are protected from changes.
- `push_whitelist_deploy_keys` (Boolean) Whether deploy keys can push to the protected branch.
- `push_whitelist_teams` (List of String) List of team names allowed to push to the protected branch.
- `push_whitelist_usernames` (List of String) List of usernames allowed to push to the protected branch.
- `require_signed_commits` (Boolean) Whether commits must be signed.
- `required_approvals` (Number) The number of approvals required before a pull request can be merged.
- `rule_name` (String) The name of the branch protection rule.
- `status_check_contexts` (List of String) List of status check contexts that must pass before merging.
- `unprotected_file_patterns` (String) Glob patterns of files that are exempt from protection.
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the branch protection rule was last updated.
